description: Are you looking for a light and reviving drink to cool down this summer?Margaritas are always a hit, but they can often be loaded with calories. Not this one, though! The Grilled Grapefruit Margarita is a low-calorie cocktail that's perfect for barbecues and happy hours alike.It only takes a few minutes to make, so it's the perfect drink to whip up when you're short on time. Plus, its smoky flavor and stimulating citrus juices will impress your guests. Give this recipe a try at your next party—we promise you won't be disappointed!
